Object.Field: Set this option to True if you are using generic SQL syntax for filter conditions. Set this option to False if you are using Spark Python syntax for filter conditions. NOTE: If this option is set to False (non-default), and expression is a constant - specify expression as lit(<my constant value>) Check pyspark.sql.functions module reference for more info about lit function: pyspark.sql.functions.lit(col) - Creates a Column of literal value.

COMPONENT NAME: XKM Spark Split COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.1.3.0.1 or above
DESCRIPTION:
Split data into multiple paths with multiple conditions.
